title: biasfield
description: Computes the bias field by dividing the (unconformed) orig.mgz by the norm.mgz.

biasfield_output.title: Bias Field Output
biasfield_output.description: Generated bias field in the subject MRI directory

rawavg_cor_norm.title: Rawavg Corrected Normalized
rawavg_cor_norm.description: The rawavg.mgz in 256^3, 1mm^3 space with the bias field removed
